name: Death Race (itch) (DeveloperJohn)
description:
Controlls:
W, S    move forward, backward
A, D     turn left, right

Your goal is to hit as much enemies as u can with a car. But facing them with a naked car won't end well. So in different points on the map you can find power ups that will make you stronger in some way. Hope you like it!

I need a lemon tea after this
